text: Rumen Nikolov (; born 5 February 1990) is a Bulgarian footballer who plays as a forward for Spartak Varna. ==Career== In November 2009 Cherno More's manager Velizar Popov selected Nikolov for the main squad, and on 28 March 2010 he made his debut in the A PFG at the age of 20 against Minyor Pernik. He decided to wear number 90.
